The vault door accepts admin signatures, but the system trusts any message signed with exponent 3. Hereâ€™s the intercepted signature: 0x6f51b2a4f9801371f854d336747810db4dc7186871a35949a7cc76660a1e95f7a2c2f275ec5cadbfb3d4ab7872bef811b3959f3abce67187bc198e72903943e

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{9jpg69rm}
ciphertext: 0x6f51b2a4f9801371f854d336747810db4dc7186871a35949a7cc76660a1e95f7a2c2f275ec5cadbfb3d4ab7872bef811b3959f3abce67187bc198e72903943e

hint: What happens when you cube small numbers? Remember e=3!
necessary_info: Public Key (n, e): (7899413541601966806707100311777838736132176779000972697589437945635137212745508513557985248954755950736778121341903969105667005812834715687372802283515047, 3)
